message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you that I believe will be of great value to your business. I'm offering you this product, which I understand is worth at least $1500000 to you, at a special price.  Consider this a chance to acquire a valuable asset at a price that's significantly below market value. Let's talk numbers - I'm willing to part with it for $1200000.  It's a win-win situation.  Let me know your thoughts.
